get.summary: Retrieve a list of tasks for the authenticated user.
get.description: This endpoint returns a list of tasks along with their details, including status and priority.

response.description: Indicates whether the request was successful.

items.description: An array of messages related to the request.

id_user.description: Identifier of the user who owns the task.

description.description: Detailed description of the task. Can be null.

created_at.description: Timestamp when the task was created.

updated_at.description: Timestamp when the task was last updated.

id.description: Unique identifier for the task's status.
Unique identifier for the task's priority.

response.description: Indicates whether the request was unsuccessful.

get.summary: Retrieve a task by its ID.
get.description: This endpoint returns details of a specific task identified by its unique ID, including status and priority.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the task to retrieve.

response.description: Indicates whether the request was successful.

items.description: An array of messages related to the request.

id_user.description: Identifier of the user who owns the task.

description.description: Detailed description of the task. Can be null.

created_at.description: Timestamp when the task was created.

updated_at.description: Timestamp when the task was last updated.

id.description: Unique identifier for the task's status.
Unique identifier for the task's priority.

response.description: Indicates whether the request was unsuccessful.
